scripts.oldpackage: cp -R css images js index.html how-does-adblock-work.html about.html google*.html contact.html robots.txt sitemap.xml terms-of-use.html build/
scripts.s3: npm run clean && npm run oldpackage && cp -R build/* s3/
scripts.s3minifycss: minify s3/js/app.js > s3/js/app.min.js && minify s3/css/stylesheet.css > s3/css/stylesheet.min.css && rm -rf s3/js/app.js s3/css/normalize.css s3/css/skeleton.css s3/css/stylesheet.css
scripts.s3gzip: gzip -9 s3/css/*.css && gzip -9 s3/js/*.js && gzip -9 s3/*.html && find s3/. -name "*.gz" -type f -execdir sh -c 'mv -v {} $(basename {} .gz)' \;
scripts.s3minifyhtml: htmlmin -o s3/index.html.min s3/index.html && mv -f s3/index.html.min s3/index.html
scripts.s3build: npm run clean && npm run s3 && npm run s3minifycss && npm run s3minifyhtml && npm run s3gzip
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run s3 && npm run s3minifycss && npm run s3minifyhtml && static-server -i index.html -f -d s3/
